definition: ring pull (can)/strap handle (on bus or train)/circular door handle
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in

sentences.english: Featuring an easy to use ring pull zip.
sentences.chinese: 它采用了易于使用的拉链拉环。

sentences.english: Featuring elasticated cuffs and an easy to use ring pull zip.
sentences.chinese: 设有松紧袖口和一个易于使用的拉链拉环。

sentences.english: Dual pull tabs for an easy on and off.
sentences.chinese: 双拉环，一个简单的开和关。

sentences.english: All zippers have neat molded little plastic pulls that are easy to grab.
sentences.chinese: 所有拉链都是整齐的塑料拉环，因此很容易拉。

sentences.english: Padded collar and tongue with nylon heel pull loop.
sentences.chinese: 加垫衣领和舌头用尼龙脚跟拉环。

sentences.english: Featuring an internal pocket for extra security and an easy to use ring pull zip.
sentences.chinese: 它采用了额外的安全和易于使用的内部口袋拉链拉环。

definition: to unscrew/to twist off (a lid)/to turn on (a faucet)/to switch on (by turning a knob)/to turn (a door handle)/to wrench apart
a buckle or fastener for clothing that does not use a button and buttonhole (e.g. the buckle on metal wristwatches)
bolt (for locking a window, cabinet etc)/(electrical) plug
